extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for JSON handling

      static int getArrayLength(java.lang.String arrayUrl)
      Returns length of JSONArray from arrayUrl.
      static java.util.List<JSONArray> getArrays(java.lang.String arrayUrl)
      This method returns a list which consists of: JSONArray from given arrayUrl and all JSONArrays taken from next urls from Link header

    • Method Detail

      • getArrayLength

        public static int getArrayLength(java.lang.String arrayUrl)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 JSONException
        Returns length of JSONArray from arrayUrl. Note, that array under given url can be only a part of whole result, that's why this method handles that and checks for Link header to see if there is a continuation of array in other url.
        Parameters:
        arrayUrl - - url of initial part of JSONArray
        Returns:
        length of JSONArray which starts at arrayUrl
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException

      • getArrays

        public static java.util.List<JSONArray> getArrays(java.lang.String arrayUrl)
                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  JSONException
        This method returns a list which consists of: JSONArray from given arrayUrl and all JSONArrays taken from next urls from Link header
        Parameters:
        arrayUrl - - url of initial part of JSONArray
        Returns:
        List of JSONArrays
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JSONException
